## PR Type – Types of Changes (select exactly one)

> ⚠️ Select **one and only one** option below.  
> The selected option will be used to automatically apply the correct PR label.

- [ ] **Bug** → `bug`  
  _Alternates:_ defect, fix, bugfix, hotfix, incident

- [ ] **Feature** → `feature`  
  _Alternates:_ enhancement, story, new-feature, improvement, capability, functional-change, breaking-change

- [ ] **Tech Debt** → `tech-debt`  
  _Alternates:_ refactor, chore, cleanup, maintenance, optimization, code-quality, restructure, codebase-improvement
